All Classes

Class Description
ActivitySelectorScreen  
ArrivalScreen  
CargoScreen  
ConsoleApp  
CrewHireScreen  
DiceGame
The DiceGame class uses the players/pirates current score and players turn score The player simply does one roll before asking the player if they would like to roll again the pirate turn will keep rolling the dice untill it decides to stop or gets a failed roll
DiceGameLossWindow
The loss window is activated when the pirates win the dice game, it is called from diceGameManager
DiceGameManager
DiceGameManager controls and stores the variables required to play the dice game It launches each of the corresponding windows in accordance to what is required when the game is over it will carry on the game if the player wins or enact the penalty if they lose if they can't afford the penalty it will launch the gameOver screen.
DiceGameRollWindow
Creates a summary of the players last roll, current turn value, current total score and pirates current total score Provides options to the player to lock in their current turn score or roll again
DiceGameRulesWindow
when the dice game launches this window opens to explain the rules and flow of the game
DiceGameVictoryWindow
displays a window showing the players last roll and their total score when they win the game when the button is clicked the game carries on and they arrive at their destination
